title: Ticket #7520: condor_qedit reports bad job counts when changing multiple attributes
description:
When condor_qedit is used to change multiple attributes, its counts of the number of jobs affected grows for each attribute. A count variable isn't being reset to 0 after each attribute.

An example reported by Michael Pelletier: 

[pelletm@engcloud-cm1 watchdog]$ condor_qedit 34097 periodichold true holdreason '"Testing 123"' testattr true
Set attribute "holdreason" for 1 matching jobs.
Set attribute "periodichold" for 2 matching jobs. <=====
Set attribute "testattr" for 3 matching jobs. <=====
[pelletm@engcloud-cm1 watchdog]$
